title: ampersand and space character
extract: ampersand. An ampersand is a shorthand symbol for "and." It looks like this: & . ... The word ampersand is a mix of Latin and English and a condensed version of the phrase "and per se and," which means "(the character) '&' by itself is 'and'."
extract_html: ampersand. An ampersand is a shorthand symbol for "and." It looks like this: & . ... The word ampersand is a mix of Latin and English and a condensed version of the phrase "and per se and," which means "(the character) '&' by itself is 'and'."
